Package channels

Class ReadyMealChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • channels.ReadyMealChannel
  • public final class ReadyMealChannel
extends java.lang.Object
    The class describes the condition and behavior of the type of a food channel through which operations with ready meals are performed. The class is an implementation of the Singleton design pattern.

        public void makeRequest​(Request request)
